             EUI - Erigone User Interface              
           A Development environment for the Erigone Model Checker
      Copyright 2008-9 by Mordechai (Moti) Ben-Ari. GNU GPL.
              See copyright.txt

For Windows, download and run the installer eui-N.exe.
For other systems, download the zip archive and open
in a clean directory.

Download the Erigone model checker and copy erigone.exe
to the directory where you installed EUI.

Run by:
  javaw -jar EUI.jar
